Title: Rare mountain gorilla twins born in the wild
DescriptionAlt: Gorilla holds two babies in a forest
DescriptionTitle: Mafuko, a female mountain gorilla from the Bageni family holds her newly born twins at the Virunga National Park, Democratic Republic of Congo, in this undated handout picture released January 7, 2026. Mafuko was born into the Kabirizi family on May 23, 2003. Following the assassination of her mother by armed individuals on June 8, 2007, she stayed with the Kabirizi family alongside her sister Tumaini. The birth increases the Bageni family to 59 individuals, the largest in the Park.
